chat_history.message:
Hello, I have a problem with my iPhone 12 Pro that occurred less than a year after purchase. The battery state is still in warranty and the maximum capacity is 78%. Since the product is still under warranty, I would like to request assistance regarding the issue found. Thank you

Thank you for your help,

Salve agente,

Il venditore non può elaborare la restituzione a causa del seguente problema:
Prodotto fuori garanzia.
Ha aggiunto ulteriori dettagli nel seguente messaggio: Dear Backcare,

According to the BackMarket Quality Charter 3.4.2, the device is out of warranty. Please note that if the battery state is below 80%, the customer has to open the technical service request within 6 months of receiving their item. It has been almost a year since the customer receive their item on 24/05/2023. Hence, we would be returning the out of warranty device to the customer. I have attached a picture of the Quality Charter for your reference.

Kindly provide the customer's address in the following format:

NAME
ADDRESS
POST CODE
TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY
PHONE NUMBER

Regards,
SY

Hi ecomobile,

proceed to shipment in the next 24 business hours, or we will refund the order.

Thanks for understanding.

Best regards,
Andreia, from Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The order is currently being shipped. The tracking number is 10084001710596.

Regards,
AS
